justification: Misreads Team B’s zero-RB philosophy—this deal consolidates into RB and costs them WR depth. B trusts consensus and values touches; Hernandez (Tier 1, friendly playoff slate) is a lateral swap with Taylor, making the added WR giveaway irrational. Rationale is generic and incorrectly frames Hernandez as merely a committee back. Little separation of A’s interests from B’s incentives, and the 0.68 accept probability is unrealistic.
